DOC.brief_title: Nighttime Protein Intake Overnight Lipolysis Morning Fat Oxidation Obese Men
DOC.criteria: Healthy , sedentary overweight obese ( BMI ≥25 kg/m^2 ; body fat ≥ 25 % ) men Men exercise 2 day per week 45 minute per session ( within past 6 month ) , uncontrolled hypertension ( Blood Pressure ( BP ) > 160/100 mmHg , diagnose cardiovascular disease , stroke , diabetes , thyroid kidney dysfunction , take cholesterol medication , allergy milk product exclude . Smokers also exclude .
